head.title: block-no-empty
head.description: block-no-empty Disallow empty blocks. The following patterns are considered warnings: The following patterns are not considered warnings…

body:
#block-no-empty

Disallow empty blocks.

 a { }
/** ↑
 * Blocks like this */

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {}
a { }
@media print { a {} }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { color: pink; }
@media print { a { color: pink; } }
